title: Renovated Lakeview East 1Bed, AMZING VIEW, Rooftop, Parking Available
posting_body: Beautiful condo-quality 1 bedroom on the 15th floor of a mid-rise building.
Located in the the middle of prime Lakeview East!
Close to the Broadway, Clark, & Diversey corridor.
Shopping, restaurants, and coffee right at your doorstep.
Plus, easy lakefront access!
Short walk to the Wellington Brown Line station.
- Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, extra counter and cabinet space, and granite countertops.
- Amazing natural light with beautiful city view.
- Bathroom with extra vanity storage.
- Wall AC units in both the living and bedrooms.
- Card-operated laundry in building.
- Rooftop Patio with 360 city views!
(Must see for the Air & Water Show, 4th of July Fireworks, etc)
- Secure entry, elevator building.
- Package room.
- Garage parking (additional monthly cost, ask me about availability)
- Bike storage.
- Pet friendly!!
- Gas and heat included.
**445 W Wellington**
Just added to the market and will not last!
